sentences.en: Clogs are part of the Dutch traditional costume.
sentences.cn: 木屐是荷兰传统装束的一部分.

sentences.en: Clogs are part of the Netherlands national costume.
sentences.cn: 木屐是荷兰民族服装的一部分.

sentences.en: Even from a distance the effect of his fox costume was stunning.
sentences.cn: 即使从远处看，他的狐狸戏服也很抢眼。

sentences.en: Hallowe’en costumes
sentences.cn: 万圣节前夕化装服

sentences.en: I felt a bit self-conscious in my swimming costume.
sentences.cn: 我穿着游泳衣觉得有点害羞。

sentences.en: I'm going to be emceeing a costume contest.
sentences.cn: 我将担任一场扮装比赛的司仪。

sentences.en: In all, she has eight costume changes.
sentences.cn: 她总共换了8次演出服。

sentences.en: performers dressed in period costume
sentences.cn: 穿古装的演员

sentences.en: She patted Mona, taking care not to disturb her costume.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻拍了拍莫娜，小心翼翼地，生怕弄乱她的戏服。

sentences.en: She rinsed out the sea water from her swimming - costume.
sentences.cn: 她把游泳衣里的海水冲洗掉.

sentences.en: She wore a one-piece white bathing costume.
sentences.cn: 她穿着白色的连体泳衣。

sentences.en: She wore an antique gown to the costume party.
sentences.cn: 她在化装舞会上穿着一件过时的长袍.

sentences.en: The actors were still in costume and make-up.
sentences.cn: 这些演员仍是戏装打扮。

sentences.en: The advertisements of costume in Paris broadened his outlook.
sentences.cn: 巴黎的服装广告使他大开眼界.

sentences.en: The dancers were in national costume .
sentences.cn: 舞者都穿着民族服装。

sentences.en: The dancers were in national costume . ＃
sentences.cn: 舞者都穿着民族服装。

sentences.en: the film’s lavish costumes and spectacular sets
sentences.cn: 影片中奢华的戏装和壮观的场景

sentences.en: The gorgeous costume added to the brilliance of the dance.
sentences.cn: 华丽的服装使舞蹈更加光彩夺目.

sentences.en: Though the costume consists only of a sheet, it was very effective.
sentences.cn: 虽然那件化装服装仅由一条床单组成, 但效果很好.

sentences.en: Wearing a superhero costume doesn't make anyone a superhero who can fly.
sentences.cn: 穿上超人装并不能让任何人变成能飞的超人.

words.tran_cn: 穿著特种服装的；穿著戏装的
做服装的人；服饰供应商

phrases.tran_cn: 人造珠宝饰物；服装饰物

trans.tran_cn: 戏装，(代表某一特定地方或历史时期的)装束，（尤指聚会或娱乐活动中穿的）化装服
trans.tran_en: a set of clothes worn by an actor or by someone to make them look like something such as an animal, famous person etc
